patterns: How can I buy a parking pass?
Purchase a parking pass
Buy a pass without a ticket
Change to a weekly pass
responses: To purchase a pass without a ticket, press the 'Pass' button on the screen. You can change the pass type to daily, weekly, or monthly by pressing the 'Next' button.

patterns: I lost my parking ticket
What do I do if I can't find my ticket?
Charge for a lost ticket
responses: If you've lost your ticket, you can purchase a replacement from the pay station. Please note that you will be charged for the maximum time.

patterns: My parking ticket is not readable
Ticket won't scan
Can't read my parking pass
responses: Please try again and ensure the ticket is inserted properly. If it's still unreadable, try another exit or pay station. If the ticket still doesn't work, visit an attendant at the site office.

intents.tag: Have you been here more than 3 hours?
patterns: Have I exceeded the parking time limit?
What if I've been here for over 3 hours?
responses: If you've been parked for more than 3 hours, please purchase a lost ticket from the pay station and use that to exit.

patterns: My parking pass is not scanning
Can't read my monthly pass
responses: If your parking pass is unreadable, please try another exit, or visit an attendant at the site office for assistance.

intents.tag: Does the screen state BAD I/O?
patterns: The screen says BAD I/O, what should I do?
Error message BAD I/O
responses: If the screen shows BAD I/O, please ensure you are following the proper entry and exit procedure. The pass must be used for both entry and exit.

patterns: Machine will not give out a ticket
Machine will not accept ticket
Machine will not accept credit card
Credit card is stuck in the machine
responses: If you're facing machine issues, please follow these steps: [Provide guidance based on the specific issue]. If the problem persists, visit an attendant at the site office.

patterns: Credit card placement
Banknote/bill placement
Change has not been dispensed
Missing receipt
Credit card is unreadable
Using a different credit card than was used for entry
responses: For payment-related issues, please follow these steps: [Provide guidance based on the specific issue]. If you encounter any problems, visit an attendant at the site office.

patterns: Ticket was paid for, but the gate will not open
It does not say 'Paid' on the ticket?
Gate accepts ticket but does not open
Gate won't open and no ticket returned
Credit card inserted but gate will not open
responses: If you're experiencing gate issues, please follow these steps: [Provide guidance based on the specific issue]. If the problem persists, visit an attendant at the site office.

patterns: Cannot hear operator/operator cannot hear you
Delivery access
Damaged machine/vandalism
responses: For other issues, please follow these steps: [Provide guidance based on the specific issue]. If needed, visit an attendant at the site office.
